it.ncorti.tdp.user

Class GameFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.ncorti.tdp.user.GameFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteGame, Serializable, Remote

    public class GameFacade
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteGame
    Classe facade per gestire in modo semplificato l'avvio e lo stop del videogioco
    Author:
    Nicola Corti
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
